title: Improve XAML styles to be more like CSS
body: The main item is multiple style inheritance but it would be nice if people's knowledge of CSS styles could be more portable to XAML.

comments.body:
Hi S Olson,
maybe you would like to take a look at my library XamlCSS which lets you define styles in CSS language.
https://www.nuget.org/packages/XamlCSS.WPF/0.9.0-alpha
Thanks for your response. Although I am disappointed I appreciate the time you took to consider it.
